# The `VarLocMap` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

VarLocMap is used for two things: 1) Assigning <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-varlocbasedimpl-cpp-/#a1a71406009b70e55de914dc6374ce484">LocIndices</a> to a VarLoc.

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-varlocbasedimpl-cpp-/#a1a71406009b70e55de914dc6374ce484">LocIndices</a> can be used to virtually insert a VarLoc into a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-varlocbasedimpl-cpp-/#a0fcac79d5789c3482f72fdb2eb8d0a32">VarLocSet</a>. 2) Given a <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-varlocbasedimpl-cpp-/locindex">LocIndex</a>, look up the unique associated VarLoc.

Definition at line 790 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/livedebugvalues/varlocbasedimpl-cpp">VarLocBasedImpl.cpp</a>.
